value.title: Introduction to data modeling in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the basics of data modeling in Power BI, to get you started fast and easy!  Links to mentioned resources: Flat tables vs models power bi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWHE8N3AkT0  Get covid data in power bi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vfAz7XDuH0 or https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r9i7CTdOsBo

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the user‚Äôs attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).
